Home.full-stack-content-creator: Onye Okike Ihe Nchịkọta zuru ezu

Header.search_placeholder: Chọọ isiokwu ma ọ bụ tinye URL
Header.beta_disclaimer_1: VideoWiki bụ ihe akaebe nke echiche maka ngwá ọrụ nke na-enye gị ohere ijikọ aka mepụta ma dezie vidiyo site na ịdọrọ ma tụfuo foto na vidiyo site na Wikimedia Commons gaa na ederede Wikipedia dị mkpa.
Header.beta_disclaimer_2: VideoWiki nọ ugbu a na ọkwa Beta ma n'agbanyeghị ọganihu anyị, anyị ejirila naanị mkpocha n'elu. Anyị na-arụsi ọrụ ike iji gbakwunye ọtụtụ atụmatụ na ọrụ ndị ọzọ. Onye ọ bụla, gụnyere onwe gị, nwere ike idezi isiokwu VideoWiki ọbụlagodi na ọ naghị abanye. Aha onye ọrụ gị (ma ọ bụrụ na ị jiri otu) ma ọ bụ adreesị IP ga-ejikọta ya na edezi gị.
Header.login_success: Ọ dị egwu! Ugbu a ị nwere ike bulite faịlụ na VideoWiki kpọmkwem site na kọmputa gị.
Header.logo_description: The Free Multi-Media Encyclopedia nke onye ọ bụla nwere ike dezie.

Footer.text_audio_license: Ederede na ọdịyo dị n'okpuru <0 href='https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/' target='blank'> Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike License 3.0 ma ọ bụ karịa.</0> Onyonyo gụnyere ndị nọ n'ime vidiyo dị n'okpuru ikikere mepere emepe yana ihe okike dị iche iche.
